basics.name: Federico Tasso
basics.label: Senior frontend dev
basics.summary: I'm an enthusiastic technologist with more than ten years of experience in web development. I've worked in many types of companies, this has given me good flexibility in the role to cover. I am a very product-focused developer who prioritizes user feedback first and foremost. Thanks to my curiosity I'm always hungry for new adventures.

highlights: Striving to align Customer Insights to a unified User Experience.
Collaborate with the PO and the Backend team to propose new possible features to the product
Coordinate the Frontend team in his activities
